SEARCH
Package com.github.utils.src.main.http

Class HttpUtils

java.lang.Object
com.github.utils.src.main.http.HttpUtils
public class HttpUtils extends Object
A utility class for making HTTP requests with support for synchronous and asynchronous operations. Provides methods for common HTTP verbs (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, PATCH) with JSON serialization/deserialization. TODO: Refactor this class to use @UtilityClass in the future to make it a true utility class.

      Creates a new HttpUtils instance with default configuration.

    • HttpUtils

      public HttpUtils(Duration timeout)
      Creates a new HttpUtils instance with the specified timeout.
      Parameters:
      timeout - the timeout for all requests

    • HttpUtils

      public HttpUtils(HttpClient.Builder clientBuilder, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper objectMapper, Duration timeout)
      Creates a new HttpUtils instance with custom configuration.
      Parameters:
      clientBuilder - custom HttpClient.Builder to use
      objectMapper - custom ObjectMapper to use
      timeout - default timeout for requests

    • downloadFile

      public void downloadFile(String fileUrl, Path destinationPath) throws HttpUtilsException
      Downloads a file from the specified URL and saves it to the specified destination path.
      Parameters:
      fileUrl - the URL of the file to download
      destinationPath - the path to save the file to
      Throws:
      HttpUtilsException - if an error occurs

    • downloadFile

      public void downloadFile(String fileUrl, String destinationPath) throws HttpUtilsException
      Downloads a file from the specified URL and saves it to the specified destination path string.
      Parameters:
      fileUrl - the URL of the file to download
      destinationPath - the path to save the file to as a string
      Throws:
      HttpUtilsException - if an error occurs

    • downloadFileAsync

      public CompletableFuture<Path> downloadFileAsync(String fileUrl, Path destinationPath, Consumer<Double> progressListener)
      Downloads a file asynchronously from the specified URL and saves it to the specified destination path.
      Parameters:
      fileUrl - the URL of the file to download
      destinationPath - the path to save the file to
      progressListener - a callback function that is called with progress updates (0.0 to 1.0)
      Returns:
      a CompletableFuture that completes when the download is finished

    • getAsync

      public CompletableFuture<String> getAsync(String url)
      Sends a GET request asynchronously and returns a CompletableFuture with the response body as a string.
      Parameters:
      url - the URL to send the request to
      Returns:
      a CompletableFuture that completes with the response body

    • getAsync

      public CompletableFuture<String> getAsync(String url, Map<String,String> headers)

      Parameters:
      url - the URL to send the request to
      headers - the headers to include with the request
      Returns:
      a CompletableFuture that completes with the response body

    • postAsync

      public CompletableFuture<String> postAsync(String url, Object body)
      Sends a POST request asynchronously with a JSON body and returns a CompletableFuture with the response body as a string.
      Parameters:
      url - the URL to send the request to
      body - the object to serialize as the request body
      Returns:
      a CompletableFuture that completes with the response body
